verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Should a wise <S%H2450>man<s%> make <S%H6030>answer<s%> with <S%H7307>vain<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, And <S%H4390>fill<s%> <S%H990>himself<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind<s%>?
Should he <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H5532>unprofitable<s%> <S%H1697>talk<s%>, Or with <S%H4405>speeches<s%> wherewith he can do no <S%H3276>good<s%>?
Yea <S%H6565><s%>, thou doest away with <S%H3374>fear<s%>, And <S%H1639>hinderest<s%> <S%H7881>devotion<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.
For thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H502>teacheth<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, And thou <S%H977>choosest<s%> the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H6175>crafty<s%>.
Thine own <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7561>condemneth<s%> <S%H8193>thee<s%>, and not I; Yea, thine own lips testify against <S%H6030>thee<s%>.
Art thou the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> that was <S%H3205>born<s%>? Or wast thou <S%H2342>brought<s%> forth <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%>?
Hast thou <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5475>secret<s%> counsel of <S%H433>God<s%>? And dost thou <S%H1639>limit<s%> wisdom to <S%H2451>thyself<s%>?
What <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3045>thou<s%>, that we know <S%H995>not<s%>? What understandest thou, which is not in us?
With us are both the <S%H7867>gray-headed<s%> and the very <S%H3453>aged<s%> <S%H3524>men<s%>, Much <S%H3117>elder<s%> than thy <S%H1>father<s%>.
Are the <S%H8575>consolations<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> too <S%H4592>small<s%> for <S%H1697>thee<s%>, Even the word that is gentle toward <S%H328>thee<s%>?
Why doth thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> carry thee <S%H3947>away<s%>? And why do thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7335>flash<s%>,
That against <S%H410>God<s%> thou <S%H7725>turnest<s%> thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, And lettest <S%H4405>words<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?
What is <S%H582>man<s%>, that he should be <S%H2135>clean<s%>? And he that is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%>, that he should be <S%H6663>righteous<s%>?
Behold <S%H539><s%>, he putteth no trust in his <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H8064>ones<s%>; Yea, the heavens are not <S%H2141>clean<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>:
How much less <S%H376>one<s%> that is <S%H8581>abominable<s%> and <S%H376>corrupt<s%>, A man that <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%>!
I will <S%H2331>show<s%> <S%H8085>thee<s%>, hear thou <S%H2372>me<s%>; And that which I have seen I will <S%H5608>declare<s%>:
(Which <S%H2450>wise<s%> men have <S%H5046>told<s%> From their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and have not hid <S%H3582>it<s%>;
Unto whom alone the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%>, And no <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>):

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H2342>travaileth<s%> with pain all his <S%H3117>days<s%>, Even the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> that are <S%H6845>laid<s%> up for the <S%H6184>oppressor<s%>.
A <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H6343>terrors<s%> is in his <S%H241>ears<s%>; In <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> shall come upon <S%H935>him<s%>.
He <S%H539>believeth<s%> not that he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, And he is <S%H6822>waited<s%> for of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

He wandereth <S%H5074>abroad<s%> for <S%H3899>bread<s%>, <S%H3045>saying<s%>, Where is it? He knoweth that the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> is <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
Distress <S%H6862><s%> and <S%H4691>anguish<s%> make him <S%H1204>afraid<s%>; They <S%H8630>prevail<s%> against <S%H4428>him<s%>, as a king <S%H6264>ready<s%> to the <S%H3593>battle<s%>.
Because he hath stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H410>God<s%>, And behaveth himself <S%H1396>proudly<s%> against the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>;
He <S%H7323>runneth<s%> upon him with a stiff <S%H6677>neck<s%>, With the <S%H5672>thick<s%> <S%H1354>bosses<s%> of his <S%H4043>bucklers<s%>;
Because he hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> with his <S%H2459>fatness<s%>, And <S%H6213>gathered<s%> <S%H6371>fat<s%> upon his <S%H3689>loins<s%>;
And he hath <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3582>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, In <S%H1004>houses<s%> which no man <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>, Which were <S%H6257>ready<s%> to become <S%H1530>heaps<s%>;
He shall not be <S%H6238>rich<s%>, neither shall his <S%H2428>substance<s%> <S%H6965>continue<s%>, Neither shall their <S%H5186>possessions<s%> be <S%H4512>extended<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

He shall not <S%H5493>depart<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; The <S%H7957>flame<s%> shall dry <S%H3001>up<s%> his <S%H3127>branches<s%>, And by the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H6310>God<s%>'s mouth shall he go <S%H5493>away<s%>.
Let him not <S%H539>trust<s%> in <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, <S%H8582>deceiving<s%> <S%H7723>himself<s%>; For vanity shall be his <S%H8545>recompense<s%>.
It shall be <S%H4390>accomplished<s%> <S%H3808>before<s%> his <S%H3117>time<s%>, And his <S%H3712>branch<s%> shall not be <S%H7488>green<s%>.
He shall shake <S%H2554>off<s%> his unripe <S%H1154>grape<s%> as the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, And shall cast <S%H7993>off<s%> his <S%H5328>flower<s%> as the <S%H2132>olive-tree<s%>.
For the <S%H5712>company<s%> of the <S%H2611>godless<s%> shall be <S%H1565>barren<s%>, And <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H7810>bribery<s%>.
They <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H5999>mischief<s%>, and bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, And their <S%H990>heart<s%> <S%H3559>prepareth<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
